name: Fallen, Demo Version
description:
Welcome to the Demo Version of Fallen, the Visual Novel!

This demo features several key features of the game.

The actual storyline is not fully featured here.

Check out its official Steam Store @ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1513930/Fallen/ !

Do you want to join in the game as one of the characters? You can get a slot @ https://ko-fi.com/fallenvn !

We also accept other forms of funding to help us create the game to its fullest potential! Please kindly make the donations to our Ko-fi page.

Follow our Twitter for more updates!

Follow our Discord to have a chat with us too!
